activity: Quick Coffee Stop at Kaffeekommune Münster
description: Stop by the local coffee shop for a warm drink and a quick break before continuing your exploration of Münster.

locationInfo.description: A cozy and modern café offering a variety of hot beverages perfect for warming up in cold weather.
safetyTips: Wear warm clothing, as it’s chilly outside.
Take care of your belongings in crowded spaces.
Keep your drink secure to avoid spills.

activity: Visit to the Münster Christmas Market
description: Experience the festive atmosphere of Münster’s Christmas market with a quick stroll and some shopping for local crafts.

locationInfo.description: A short walk through Münster’s charming Christmas market filled with festive stalls and holiday treats.
safetyTips: Dress warmly as the market can be chilly.
Watch out for busy areas and crowded stalls.
Make sure to keep your group together.

description: A short stop to admire the stunning architecture of the Lambertikirche, Münster’s beautiful gothic church.

locationInfo.description: A quick visit to the historic Lambertikirche church, known for its impressive bell tower and beautiful stained-glass windows.
safetyTips: Be respectful of others inside the church.
Stay together as a group while inside.
Keep your voices low to maintain a peaceful atmosphere.

description: Gather for a brief but memorable photoshoot in the beautiful Münster Town Hall Courtyard.

locationInfo.description: Capture the group’s memories with a photoshoot in the picturesque Town Hall Courtyard, surrounded by historical buildings.
safetyTips: Wear appropriate clothing for the cold weather.
Be mindful of your surroundings to avoid accidents.
Take turns in the photos for equal participation.

activity: A Quick Walk Through Aasee Park
description: Enjoy a brief walk through Aasee Park to stretch your legs and take in the tranquil surroundings.

locationInfo.description: A short walk through the scenic Aasee Park, ideal for a brief break in the fresh air near the lake.
safetyTips: Dress warmly, especially if walking near the water.
Stay on designated pathways to avoid muddy areas.
Be aware of your surroundings, especially near the lake.
